column4: hey guys...i just installed the nVIDIA drivers from Synaptec....and ran the config....but its giving me this "Error: your X configuration has been altered.
This script cannot proceed automatically. If you believe that this
not correct, you can update the md5sum entry executing the following
otherwise edit manually /etc/X11/xorg.conf to change the Driver section

2007-02-10T08:52:00.000Z	Skuller		sure
2007-02-10T08:54:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	/query username
2007-02-10T08:54:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	you have to be registerd iwth nickserve
2007-02-10T09:50:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	no
2007-02-10T09:50:00.000Z	Skuller	variant	cool...thnx
2007-02-10T09:51:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	wine comes with it's own limmited directx implementation
2007-02-10T09:51:00.000Z	Skuller	variant	limited?...ok...well thnx...hope it works
2007-02-10T09:52:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	good choice
2007-02-10T09:55:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	there is a dev version of gaim that supportst hat afaik. other than that she will have to download skype or something for linux
2007-02-10T09:56:00.000Z	Skuller	variant	my GAIM crashes everytime i sign in with my MSN acc...so i m using kopete
2007-02-10T09:57:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	sorry, as i said. dev gaim or get her using skype
2007-02-10T09:57:00.000Z	Skuller	variant	can u explain me about dev gaim?
2007-02-10T09:59:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	http://sourceforge.net/projects/gaim-vv/
2007-02-10T09:59:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	thats a fork of gaim that has such things.. it will probably be merged with gaim at some stage
2007-02-10T10:00:00.000Z	Skuller	variant	ohh...i dun get a single thing u just said cept that link u gave wich i m visiting now
2007-02-10T10:11:00.000Z	variant	Skuller	see the message from ubotu
